================
AM5
================

Introduction
================

Successor of :doc:`AM4`, uses the :doc:`/Memory/DDR5`memory standard. 
Closely related to :doc:`sTRX5`.

Key Facts & Figures
====================

.. list-table::
   :widths: 50 75
   :header-rows: 0

   * - Microarchitecture:
     - :doc:`/AMD/Microarchs/Ryzen`
   * - Process nodes:
     - TSMC 5nm or 3nm
   * - Core counts:
     - 6, 8, 12 or 16 (inc. SMT)
   * - Native FSB:
     - 100 MHz

Benching it
================

TBA
